mapper.sql: MEMBER_ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, FULLNAME, PHONE, SEX, PHOTO, WAITACCOUNT, ALREADYACCOUNT, WXOPEN_ID, FROMWXOPEN_ID, MEMBERTYPE_ID, CLASS, MARKET_ID
mapper.select:
select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, m.CLASS, m.MARKET_ID, m.LEVEL, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from ( select *,1 as level from member m where m.fromwxopen_id = #{WXOPEN_ID} UNION all select *,2 as level from member m where m.fromwxopen_id in (select wxopen_id from member m where m.fromwxopen_id = #{WXOPEN_ID}) ) m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where 1 = 1
and ( m.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.FULLNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') OR m.PHONE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and m.MEMBERTYPE_ID = #{MEMBERTYPE_ID}
order by m.MEMBER_ID ASC
select MEMBERTYPE_ID, MEMBERTYPENAME from membertype order by MEMBERTYPE_ID asc

select m.MEMBER_ID, m.USERNAME, m.NICKNAME, m.FULLNAME, m.PHONE, m.SEX, m.PHOTO, m.WAITACCOUNT, m.ALREADYACCOUNT, m.WXOPEN_ID, m.FROMWXOPEN_ID, m.MEMBERTYPE_ID, m.CLASS, m.MARKET_ID, mt.MEMBERTYPENAME from m left join membertype mt on m.membertype_id = mt.membertype_id where m.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}

select IFNULL((select sum(givemoney) memoney from account where member_id = #{MEMBER_ID} and type=2),0) AS MEACCOUNT, IFNULL((select sum(givemoney) from account where type in (3,4) and member_id = #{MEMBER_ID}),0) AS TEAMACCOUNT FROM DUAL
